query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS support_tickets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'open',
    priority VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'medium',
    assigned_to INTEGER,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    resolved_at TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2y6sS8DpnU5zjJD.root --database 9Rouc7DxCXtQDEEF5GnzG8 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS support_tickets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'open',
    priority VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'medium',
    assigned_to INTEGER,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    resolved_at TIMESTAMP
);
